Excel.title: Standardize Dates & Currency
Excel.text: Format this Excel sheet so all dates follow DD/MM/YYYY, all currency is CAD with two decimals, and duplicates are highlighted.

Excel.title: Quick Dashboard
Excel.text: Create a dashboard from this raw data: pivot tables, conditional formatting, and styled charts in a clean theme.

Word.title: Semantic Structure
Word.text: Reformat this Word document with consistent heading styles, a table of contents, and numbered lists.

PDF.title: Fillable Form
PDF.text: Convert this Word application into a fillable PDF form with text fields, checkboxes, and a digital signature field.

PDF.title: sleepytime
PDF.text: create a night routine as a dermatologist and give me my routine for my skin type (ask 4 questions to determin the skin type.

Sugar.title: Negotiation
Sugar.text: Teach me the top 5 negotiation lines sugar babies use to get clear terms (allowance, gifts, boundaries) without making it awkward.

Learning Path.title: Conversation Starter
Learning Path.text: Give me a script for the first conversation with a potential sugar daddy that sets a playful, alluring tone without sounding desperate.
